brand_personality: Professional yet warm and approachable pet care service. Conveys cleanliness, expertise, and genuine love for animals. Balances modern spa aesthetics with friendly, trustworthy service.

palettes.name: Fresh & Clean
palettes.reasoning: Teal and green tones convey cleanliness and freshness, essential for a grooming salon. Blue accents add professionalism and trust. Perfect for positioning as a hygienic, professional service.

palettes.name: Warm & Friendly
palettes.reasoning: Warm orange and brown tones create an inviting, friendly atmosphere. These earthy colors connect with pet owners who value a homey, caring environment for their furry friends.

palettes.name: Premium Pet Spa
palettes.reasoning: Deep purple with pink accents positions the business as a luxury pet spa. Appeals to pet owners seeking premium pampering services for their beloved companions.

typography.heading: Nunito
typography.reasoning: Nunito's rounded letterforms create a warm, approachable feeling perfect for pet services. Open Sans provides excellent readability while maintaining a friendly tone.

imagery_style: High-quality photos of well-groomed, happy pets (dogs and cats primarily). Before/after transformation shots. Clean, bright studio-style photography with soft lighting. Images should showcase professional grooming results while capturing the pets' personalities.
